name: ASTRAZENECA UK LTD.
sampleDescriptions: Educating and advocating on issues related to AstraZenecas efforts to substitute a non-global warming gas as the propellant in its metered dose inhalers.
Seeking consideration of AstraZeneca's intention to substitute zero Global Warming Potential (GWP) gases for current propellants in its metered dose inhalers.
